channel.description: Pour valoriser la littérature et la culture du monde insulaire francophone

item.title: Par : Mixed Race Studies » Scholarly Perspectives on Mixed-Race » Infiltrating the colonial city through the imaginaries of Metissage: Saint-Louis (Senegal), Saint-Pierre (Martinique) and Jeremie (Haiti)
item.dc:creator: Mixed Race Studies » Scholarly Perspectives on Mixed-Race » Infiltrating the colonial city through the imaginaries of Metissage: Saint-Louis (Senegal), Saint-Pierre (Martinique) and Jeremie (Haiti)
item.description: […] Fanon, Sadji, Boilat, Mandeleau, Confiant, Chamoiseau, Salavina, Bonneville, Moreau de Saint-Méry, Desquiron, and Chauvet and films by Deslauriers and Palcy, I illustrate the dynamics of creolization within […]
